MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G77 postcode area of Newton Mearns. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:20pm, due to a fault on our underground cable network and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of onsite difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.46AM on 15th December 2020.
